title: Textured Whimsy
description: Un style d'illustration de livre pour enfants charmant et moderne du milieu du siècle, défini par l'application de gouache au pinceau sec et des textures de craie de cire sur un papier à grain épais. L'esthétique présente une perspective plane et naïve avec une coloration 'éraflée' qui laisse apparaître le grain du papier, combinant des formes géométriques audacieuses avec des détails crayonnés à la main.
prompt: A highly textured digital gouache and wax crayon illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a charming, naive mid-century modern children's book style. The rendering mimics dry-brush acrylics applied to heavy-tooth watercolor paper, creating a scuffed, granular look where the white of the paper speckles through the pigment, particularly in shadow areas and large color blocks. The composition is strictly flat and orthographic, lacking deep perspective, presenting the scene like a collage of cut shapes. The {{subject}} is depicted with whimsical proportions, using bold, confident shapes filled with {{primary_color}} which has a chalky, matte finish. Fine details like hair, fur, or fabric weave are added with scratchy, imperfect colored pencil or graphite strokes in dark charcoal or {{accent_color}}. The lighting is completely flat and uniform, typical of screen printing or lithography, with no realistic volumetric shading; instead, depth is suggested through overlapping layers and slight shifts in texture density. The environment is rich and cluttered but organized, filling the frame edge-to-edge with stylized elements matching the {{mood}} atmosphere. Edges are organic and rough, characteristic of a manual dry brush or pastel stick, never vector-perfect. Colors are saturated but slightly muted, evoking a vintage 1960s palette. Reinforcement tags: dry brush gouache, wax crayon texture, heavy paper tooth, scuffed paint, mid-century modern, Mary Blair influence, Miroslav Sasek style, naive art, flat design, textured illustration, chalky finish, visible grain, whimsical character design, hand-drawn imperfections, matte color, collage aesthetic, retro storybook, graphite detailing, full bleed, no border, no frame, no canvas.

The texture is heavy and granular, with {{primary_color}} wall tones or sky fills scuffed to reveal the paper tooth underneath. Accents in {{accent_color}} highlight small objects or architectural features. The lighting is uniform and illustration-flat, creating a cozy, retro storybook atmosphere. The composition is busy but balanced, resembling a backdrop from a 1960s animated film or a Miroslav Sasek travel book.

title: Doodle Pop
description: Un style d'illustration numérique ludique et énergique qui mêle la clarté de l'art vectoriel moderne à la spontanéité des croquis à main levée. Caractérisé par des contours à l'encre noire audacieux et d'épaisseur variable, une palette de couleurs strictement limitée (généralement noir, blanc et un accent vibrant), et une composition encombrée de symboles expressifs flottants comme des gribouillis, des points d'exclamation et des motifs géométriques.
prompt: Digital hand-drawn vector illustration in a playful corporate sketchnote style. The medium mimics bold felt-tip marker ink on smooth cardstock, characterized by thick, confident black contours with slight organic wobble and pressure-sensitive tapering, avoiding rigid geometric perfection. The {{subject}} is centered and integrated into a dynamic cluster of abstract shapes, rendered with simplified, friendly features and clean flat fills. The color palette is strictly limited to deep ink black, pure white, and vibrant flat blocks of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}, with absolutely no gradients, shading, or realistic lighting. The scene is densely packed with 'doodle' energy: floating squiggles, energetic motion lines, handwritten-style exclamations, stippled dots, and geometric background elements like diagonal black-and-white striped blocks and oversized stylized botanical leaves. The composition is flat and graphic, emphasizing shape hierarchy over depth. The background is a solid, warm off-white or cream paper tone that fills the frame completely. The atmosphere is {{mood}}, productive, and creative, evoking the feeling of a brainstorming session or a startup hero image. Every element has a crisp, sticker-like quality with high contrast. Reinforcement tags: playful doodle art, corporate memphis influence, bold line work, sketchnoting style, flat color, vector illustration, high contrast, limited palette, graphic design, spot illustration, ink outlines, geometric patterns, creative energy, visual thinking, full bleed, no border, no frame, no canvas.

title: Geometric Chic
description: Un style d'illustration vectorielle numérique soigné qui mélange l'esthétique Corporate Memphis avec le design graphique moderne du milieu du siècle. Il se caractérise par des aplats de couleurs audacieux, une simplification géométrique sans contours et un ombrage dur de type cel-shading pour créer des personnages vibrants, ludiques et strictement bidimensionnels.
prompt:
A pristine digital flat vector illustration rendered in a sophisticated Corporate Memphis and mid-century modern graphic design style. The image features {{subject}} composed entirely of clean, razor-sharp geometric shapes and bezier curves, devoid of any traditional outlines or sketchiness. The rendering technique mimics a high-fidelity SVG export: strictly matte, zero texture, zero noise, and absolute edge precision. The subject's form is defined by contrasting planes of solid, saturated color rather than line work. Anatomy and clothing are stylized into elegant simplifications—hair flows in smooth, ribbon-like vector clumps, facial features are reduced to charming geometric primitives (perfect circles, gentle arcs), and clothing folds are depicted as sharp triangular shadow overlays. 

Lighting is purely graphical, utilizing hard-edged cel-shading where shadows are represented by distinct, unblended blocks of a darker tone of the base hue, creating a crisp 2D depth. There are no gradients, airbrushing, or soft transitions; every color boundary is a hard cut. The color palette is vibrant and cheerful, anchored by {{primary_color}} and energized with pops of {{accent_color}}, adhering to a split-complementary or triadic harmony typical of modern tech branding. The composition is centered and iconographic, filling the frame completely with no borders or vignettes. The atmosphere is optimistic, smart, and approachable, evoking the clean visual language of premium startup illustrations or high-end lifestyle apps. {{mood}} and {{lighting}} influence the pose and color temperature, but the shading remains strictly flat and geometric. 

Reinforcement tags: flat vector art, lineless illustration, corporate memphis style, geometric minimalism, hard-edged shading, solid color blocks, adobe illustrator style, vector graphics, vibrant saturation, clean silhouette, stylized proportions, tech illustration, modern graphic design, matte finish, no gradients, no texture, crisp details, playful aesthetics, character design, full bleed, no border, no frame, no canvas.

It features bold, flat color blocking, lineless geometric simplification, and hard-edged cel-shading to create character designs that are vibrant, playful, and strictly two-dimensional.

title: Pastel Claymorphism
description: Un style de rendu 3D minimaliste caractérisé par des textures mates douces au toucher, un éclairage global doux et une palette de couleurs pastel très claire. Il imite le claymorphisme haut de gamme ou le design de jouets stylisés avec des surfaces lisses, des biseaux arrondis et des ombres d'occlusion ambiante diffuses, entièrement dépourvu de contours durs ou de bruit de surface.
prompt: High-fidelity 3D claymorphism render executed with a physically based rendering engine like Redshift or Blender Cycles, featuring {{subject}} as the central focus. The visual aesthetic is defined by 'Soft Claymorphism'—a style prioritizing tactile, velvety surfaces and geometric simplicity. The {{subject}} is modeled with exaggerated smoothness, featuring wide, rounded bevels on all edges to catch light softly, eliminating any sharp vertices. The material shader is a sophisticated matte plastic or unglazed ceramic with high roughness, creating a soft-touch appearance that diffuses light evenly across the surface, accented by elements in {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. Where transparency is required, materials behave like frosted glass with heavy subsurface scattering, blurring internal details into soft gradients rather than sharp refractions. Lighting is a hallmark of this style: a large, diffused area light source positioned top-left creates a 'softbox' studio effect, resulting in gentle, feather-soft shadows that ground the object without obscuring detail. The shadows exhibit subtle ambient occlusion in crevices, adding depth without high contrast. The color palette is strictly high-key and pastel, utilizing a creamy, warm lighting temperature that harmonizes with the materials. There are no black outlines, no cel-shading, and no grunge textures; the definition comes purely from the interplay of soft light and occlusion. The composition is clean, centered, and isometric or orthographic in perspective, creating a calm, organized look. The atmosphere evokes {{mood}} through the purity of form and softness of light. The image is rendered with a noise-free, ultra-smooth finish, resembling high-end icon design or contemporary 3D illustration found on design platforms. title: Stippled Risograph
description: Un style éditorial numérique distinctif imitant l'impression risographique et l'art vectoriel texturé, caractérisé par des formes plates recouvertes d'un grain de bruit uniforme et prononcé. Le langage visuel repose sur un éclairage en projecteur à bords nets pour créer un contraste géométrique marqué entre les zones illuminées et les ombres atténuées.
prompt:
Digital editorial illustration rendered in a textured risograph aesthetic, mimicking the look of screen printing on rough-tooth paper. The composition features {{subject}} integrated into a stylized environment with full-bleed composition, no borders, and no canvas edges. The rendering technique utilizes flat, vector-like color blocking devoid of black contours; instead, details are defined by thin, uniform-width negative space lines (often white or light cream) and distinct color separation. A defining characteristic is the heavy, uniform 'sand' or 'stipple' noise overlay that covers the entire image, giving it a tactile, gritty matte finish. 

The lighting is theatrical and specific: a {{lighting}} source casts a dramatic, hard-edged conical beam or geometric spotlight across the scene. Inside the light beam, colors are high-key, vivid, and warmer; outside the beam, the palette shifts to muted, darker, and cooler tones, creating a sharp visual threshold that cuts through the {{subject}} and environment. The color palette is restricted and sophisticated, utilizing {{primary_color}} for dominant surfaces and {{accent_color}} for focal points within the light, creating a split-complementary harmony. 

Shadows are not soft or diffused but are rendered as solid, hard shapes with the same stippled texture. Surfaces appear matte, mimicking uncoated paper stock. The atmosphere is {{mood}}, achieved through the cozy yet graphic interplay of light and shadow. Perspective is flattened, often isometric or high-angle, emphasizing shape geometry over realistic depth. The edges of the {{subject}} are crisp but textured by the global grain, avoiding the smoothness of standard digital vector art.
description_en: A distinctive digital editorial style mimicking risograph printing and textured vector art, characterized by flat shapes overlaid with heavy, uniform noise grain. The visual language relies on dramatic hard-edged spotlighting to create sharp geometric contrast between high-key illuminated areas and muted shadow zones, utilizing negative space lines for detail.
description_fr: Un style éditorial numérique distinctif imitant l'impression risographique et l'art vectoriel texturé, caractérisé par des formes plates recouvertes d'un grain de bruit uniforme et prononcé. Le langage visuel repose sur un éclairage en projecteur à bords nets pour créer un contraste géométrique marqué entre les zones illuminées et les ombres atténuées.
background_prompt: A stylized interior or surface background rendered in a textured risograph style, completely empty of foreground subjects. The scene depicts a flat, graphic environment—such as a desk surface, a wall, or a minimal room corner—bathed in {{primary_color}} tones with a heavy, uniform noise grain texture. A dramatic, hard-edged beam of light cuts across the empty space, creating a geometric shape of brighter illumination against the darker, muted surroundings. Inside the light shape, the surface texture is high-key and vivid; outside, it is shadowy and cool. The composition includes subtle environmental details like cast shadows from unseen objects or minimal architectural lines in {{accent_color}}, all rendered with a stippled, matte paper aesthetic. No frames, no borders, full bleed coverage.

title: Nocturnal Folk
description: Un style d'illustration distinctif mêlant le design graphique du milieu du siècle à l'art populaire d'Europe de l'Est et à l'esthétique de la linogravure. Caractérisé par une palette restreinte à fort contraste (généralement des bleus profonds et des rouges vifs), des formes géométriques plates décorées de motifs internes et une texture de grain tactile rappelant la risographie ou la sérigraphie.
description_en: A distinctive illustration style blending mid-century modern graphic design with Eastern European folk art and linocut aesthetics. Characterized by a high-contrast, restricted palette (typically deep blues and vibrant reds), flat geometric shapes decorated with internal patterns, and a heavy, tactile grain texture resembling risograph or screen printing.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration distinctif mêlant le design graphique du milieu du siècle à l'art populaire d'Europe de l'Est et à l'esthétique de la linogravure. Caractérisé par une palette restreinte à fort contraste (généralement des bleus profonds et des rouges vifs), des formes géométriques plates décorées de motifs internes et une texture de grain tactile rappelant la risographie ou la sérigraphie.
prompt:

title: Kinetic Cutout
description: Un style visuel audacieux canalisant les 'papiers découpés' d'Henri Matisse fusionnés avec l'iconographie expressive de Keith Haring. Il présente des silhouettes solides et très contrastées aux extrémités exagérées et aux courbes biomorphiques fluides, posées sur des champs de couleurs plats et vibrants.
description_en: A bold visual style channeling the 'papiers découpés' (paper cut-outs) of Henri Matisse merged with the expressive iconography of Keith Haring. The rendering style is strictly flat 2D vector art with zero shading, gradients, or texture, mimicking the clean slice of scissors through construction paper. The subject is abstracted into fluid, organic shapes with intentionally distorted proportions—specifically massive, exaggerated hands and feet contrasting with a diminished or stylized head, creating a sense of dynamic, primitive rhythm. The silhouette is completely opaque, filled with pure {{accent_color}}, creating a stark, high-contrast figure-ground relationship against a solid, unmodulated {{primary_color}} background. The mood is {{mood}}, conveyed entirely through the gesture and posture of the silhouette rather than facial details. The image is full bleed, extending to all four corners with no borders, frames, or vignettes, focusing entirely on the kinetic energy of the shape. title: Chromatic Hatching
description: Un style vibrant et expressif imitant le pastel à l'huile ou le crayon de cire sur papier à grain fort, caractérisé par des hachures directionnelles lâches et un espace négatif blanc visible. L'esthétique mêle la spontanéité de l'art naïf aux qualités de captation de la lumière de l'impressionnisme, utilisant des traits non mélangés pour construire la forme et la texture sans contours rigides.
description_en: A vibrant, expressive style mimicking oil pastel or soft wax crayon on heavy-tooth paper, characterized by loose, directional hatching and visible white negative space. The aesthetic blends the spontaneity of naive art with the light-capturing qualities of Impressionism, using unblended strokes to build form and texture without rigid outlines.
description_fr: Un style vibrant et expressif imitant le pastel à l'huile ou le crayon de cire sur papier à grain fort, caractérisé par des hachures directionnelles lâches et un espace négatif blanc visible. prompt: A vibrant, expressive oil pastel and wax crayon drawing on heavy-tooth textured white paper, capturing {{subject}} in a lively, naive impressionist style. The rendering technique relies entirely on loose, directional hatching and rapid gestural scribbles rather than smooth blending or solid fills. The {{subject}} is constructed through energetic, separate strokes of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}, allowing the rough grain of the paper to show through as sparkling white noise between the pigment lines. There are no hard black outlines; forms are defined by the accumulation of colored marks and the contrast between the saturated crayon wax and the white page. Trees and vertical elements are rendered with upward, jagged strokes, while ground planes use horizontal or diagonal cross-hatching to suggest depth and perspective. The lighting is high-key and diffuse, implied by the preservation of the white paper as the brightest highlight, creating a sun-drenched, breezy atmosphere typical of mid-century Scandinavian illustration or David Hockney's sketchbooks. Shadows are not black but deep cool tones like indigo or forest green sketched loosely over warmer under-layers. The composition feels spontaneous and organic, with {{mood}} communicated through the frenetic yet controlled rhythm of the hand-drawn lines. The edges of the image are rough and painterly, showing the natural start-and-stop points of the crayon on the textured surface. Full bleed, intimate perspective, tactile materiality.

title: Giverny Impasto
description: Une interprétation numérique riche de l'impressionnisme français, caractérisée par un travail au pinceau en impasto lourd, des couleurs brisées vibrantes et une attention particulière à la lumière se reflétant sur les surfaces. Ce style imite les techniques de peinture à l'huile 'mouillé sur mouillé' de Claude Monet, utilisant des touches lâches et rythmiques pour définir les formes sans contours durs.
description_en: A rich digital interpretation of French Impressionism featuring heavy impasto brushwork, vibrating broken color, and a focus on light reflecting off surfaces. The style mimics the wet-on-wet oil techniques of Claude Monet, utilizing loose, rhythmic strokes to define form without harsh outlines.
description_fr: Une interprétation numérique riche de l'impressionnisme français, caractérisée par un travail au pinceau en impasto lourd, des couleurs brisées vibrantes et une attention particulière à la lumière se reflétant sur les surfaces. Ce style imite les techniques de peinture à l'huile 'mouillé sur mouillé' de Claude Monet, utilisant des touches lâches et rythmiques pour définir les formes sans contours durs.
prompt: Heavy body impasto oil painting style inspired by Claude Monet's Nymphéas series and late French Impressionism, featuring {{subject}} immersed in a textured, atmospheric environment. The rendering technique utilizes thick, visible brushstrokes and palette knife applications, creating a tactile surface where paint ridges catch the simulated light. There are no hard outlines; forms are defined by the juxtaposition of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} dabs, using optical mixing and divisionism to create vibrancy. The lighting is diffuse and shimmering, suggestive of {{lighting}} with specular highlights represented by pure white and pastel impasto peaks. Shadows are not black but composed of deep purples, blues, and cool greens, creating a luminous shadow effect. The composition is fluid and organic, with the background and foreground blended through loose, directional strokes that mimic the ripples of water or the rustle of foliage. The atmosphere is {{mood}}, conveyed through the softness of the edges and the harmonious vibration of the color palette. Textural details include simulated canvas weave and the glossy sheen of wet oil paint. The image is full bleed, filling the entire frame with this painterly aesthetic.

title: Charcoal Croquis
description: Un style d'illustration de mode brut et gestuel imitant les esquisses rapides au fusain ou au graphite tendre sur papier texturé. Caractérisé par des hachures verticales agressives, des lignes lâches et confiantes, et un contraste élevé privilégiant la silhouette et l'attitude plutôt que la précision anatomique.
description_en: A raw, gestural fashion illustration style mimicking rapid charcoal or soft graphite sketches on textured paper. Characterized by aggressive vertical hatching, confident loose lines, and a high-contrast focus on silhouette and attitude over anatomical precision.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration de mode brut et gestuel imitant les esquisses rapides au fusain ou au graphite tendre sur papier texturé. Caractérisé par des hachures verticales agressives, des lignes lâches et confiantes, et un contraste élevé privilégiant la silhouette et l'attitude plutôt que la précision anatomique.

The {{subject}} is rendered in a rapid, gestural fashion illustration style (croquis), characterized by confident, aggressive vertical hatching strokes that define volume without enclosing outlines. The rendering creates a sense of immediacy and movement, with the {{subject}}'s form emerging from heavy, scribbled darks and untouched negative space. The stroke behavior is frenetic yet controlled, utilizing broad side-shading for mass and sharp, piercing lines for details. The palette is primarily monochromatic deep charcoal and graphite gray, with {{primary_color}} applied as a subtle, dry-pastel accent tinting the shadows, and {{accent_color}} appearing as sparse, distinct sketch marks to draw the eye. Lighting is not photorealistic but illustrative, defined by the contrast between the dense accumulation of graphite (shadow) and the raw paper grain (light). Texture is paramount: visible paper tooth, friable charcoal debris, skipped strokes where the medium glides over paper valleys, and slight smudging suggesting a hand-rubbed finish. The composition is centered and floating, capturing the {{mood}} through the energy of the line work rather than facial expression. Full bleed, no border, no frame, no canvas, focused entirely on the expressive capture of the {{subject}}.

title: Vandalized Realism
description: Une juxtaposition provocatrice de peinture à l'huile académique haute fidélité et de graffitis de rue bruts et iconoclastes. Le style imite un portrait de musée formel qui a été dégradé par des traits de marqueur épais, plats et néon, créant un contraste saisissant entre la maîtrise traditionnelle et l'irrévérence moderne.
description_en: A provocative juxtaposition of high-fidelity academic oil painting and crude, iconoclastic street art graffiti. The style mimics a formal museum portrait that has been defaced with thick, flat, neon-bright marker strokes, creating a jarring contrast between traditional mastery and modern irreverence.
description_fr: Une juxtaposition provocatrice de peinture à l'huile académique haute fidélité et de graffitis de rue bruts et iconoclastes. Le style imite un portrait de musée formel qui a été dégradé par des traits de marqueur épais, plats et néon, créant un contraste saisissant entre la maîtrise traditionnelle et l'irrévérence moderne.
prompt: A provocative mixed-media masterpiece fusing traditional Academic Realism with iconoclastic street art vandalism, full bleed, no border, no frame, no canvas. The underlying medium is a high-fidelity oil portrait of {{subject}}, executed with museum-quality technique featuring smooth wet-on-wet blending, realistic subsurface scattering on skin textures, and visible fine brushwork in the clothing and hair. The subject is posed formally, exuding gravity and seriousness, rendered in a muted, sophisticated palette of charcoal greys, deep umbers, and desaturated flesh tones reminiscent of mid-20th-century official state portraiture. Superimposed directly onto this serious visage is a layer of thick, flat, hyper-saturated {{primary_color}} graffiti strokes. These lines are monoline, unwavering, and deliberately primitive, tracing a crude caricature—circles for glasses or eyes, a simple curve for the mouth, a jagged outline for the jaw—directly over the realistic features, mocking the subject's dignity. The rendering of the overlay is distinct: it lacks texture or shadow, appearing as a pure vector shape or opaque Posca marker ink sitting on top of the varnished oil surface. The lighting on the subject is a soft, directional Rembrandt setup with a gentle falloff into shadow, contrasting with the self-luminous, flat nature of the {{primary_color}} lines. The color science relies on the violent clash between the low-key, conservative values of the painting and the electric, high-chroma intensity of the {{accent_color}} and {{primary_color}} defacement. The composition is centered and static, allowing the chaotic energy of the vandalism to vibrate against the stillness of the pose. The atmosphere is one of satirical rebellion, absurdity, and modern angst. title: Gestural Collage
description: Une esthétique mixte vibrante qui fusionne la peinture numérique réaliste avec des éléments de design graphique bruts et chaotiques, caractérisée par des contours à l'encre noire audacieux qui abstraient la silhouette du sujet. Le style imite un journal d'art analogique ou un fanzine, superposant typographie vintage, trames de demi-teintes et textures de papier vieilli avec un portrait haute fidélité.
description_en: A vibrant mixed-media aesthetic that fuses realistic digital painting with raw, chaotic graphic design elements, characterized by bold, sweeping black ink contours that abstract the subject's silhouette. The style mimics an analog art journal or zine, layering vintage typography, halftone patterns, and distressed paper textures with high-fidelity portraiture.
description_fr: Une esthétique mixte vibrante qui fusionne la peinture numérique réaliste avec des éléments de design graphique bruts et chaotiques, caractérisée par des contours à l'encre noire audacieux qui abstraient la silhouette du sujet. Le style imite un journal d'art analogique ou un fanzine, superposant typographie vintage, trames de demi-teintes et textures de papier vieilli avec un portrait haute fidélité.
prompt: Avant-garde mixed media collage illustration combining high-fidelity digital oil painting with raw graphic design elements and analog textures, full bleed, no border. The {{subject}} is the central focal point, rendered with a striking duality: the face is painted with soft, realistic sophistication, utilizing complex skin tone modulation with underpainting in violet and {{accent_color}}, featuring realistic subsurface scattering, distinct tear-duct highlights, and soft shadow transitions consistent with studio butterfly lighting. In sharp contrast, the hair and outer silhouette are deconstructed into bold, heavy, gestural black ink contours, varying significantly in thickness like a wide calligraphic brush or giant marker, creating abstract negative spaces. The composition is aggressively layered with 'zine-style' graphic debris: fragments of vintage serif typography, circular postmarks, torn paper edges, and bold geometric shapes in flat {{primary_color}}. The clothing is stylized with coarse halftone dot patterns (Ben-Day dots) and striped vector textures that flatten the form against the realistic face. The background is a textured surface resembling aged off-white cardstock or watercolor paper, stained with washes of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. The lighting is physically accurate on the face—soft, diffuse, neutral temperature—but non-existent on the graphic overlays, creating a surreal depth disparity. Texture plays a crucial role, with visible paper grain, risograph noise, ink bleed, and screen-print misalignment artifacts unifying the disparate elements. The overall atmosphere is {{mood}}, blending urban grit with artistic elegance. title: Tilt-Shift Diorama
description: Un style visuel distinctif qui simule l'effet de maquette grâce à des techniques de photographie à bascule et décentrement (tilt-shift) et une esthétique macro. Il transforme des sujets grandeur nature en modèles réduits ressemblant à des jouets en utilisant une très faible profondeur de champ, une saturation des couleurs élevée et une perspective isométrique en plongée.
description_en: A distinctive visual style that simulates miniature faking through the use of tilt-shift photography techniques and macro lens aesthetics. It transforms life-sized subjects into toy-like scale models using extreme shallow depth of field, high color saturation, and a specific high-angle isometric perspective.
description_fr: Un style visuel distinctif qui simule l'effet de maquette grâce à des techniques de photographie à bascule et décentrement (tilt-shift) et une esthétique macro. Il transforme des sujets grandeur nature en modèles réduits ressemblant à des jouets en utilisant une très faible profondeur de champ, une saturation des couleurs élevée et une perspective isométrique en plongée.
prompt: Photorealistic tilt-shift photography aesthetic rendering {{subject}} as a high-fidelity miniature scale model diorama. The image utilizes an extreme shallow depth of field consistent with macro photography (simulating an f/1.8 aperture on a large format sensor), creating a distinct horizontal plane of razor-sharp focus while the foreground and background dissolve into heavy, creamy Gaussian and bokeh blur. The {{subject}} appears constructed from high-quality model materials: matte-painted resin, structured thermoplastics, and hand-detailed textures that mimic real-world weathering but at a 1:87 scale. Lighting is configured as {{lighting}}, casting realistic, scale-appropriate shadows that emphasize the dimensional relief of the model, with specular highlights suggesting semi-gloss finishes on metallic, glass, or wet surfaces. The color palette is hyper-saturated and vibrant, reminiscent of toy packaging or architectural rendering, dominated by {{primary_color}} in the focal areas and {{accent_color}} providing striking contrast in the illuminated details, shifting towards cooler, muted tones in the blurred periphery. The composition mimics an isometric projection typical of architectural modeling, looking down from a high angle to reinforce the 'God's eye view' of a tiny world. Material textures are tactile but smoothed, lacking the gritty noise of full-scale reality, replacing it with the sheen of painted plastic or die-cast metal. The atmosphere conveys a mood of {{mood}}, utilizing color grading that enhances the warmth of lights and the cool depth of shadows. title: Riso Pop
description: Un style d'illustration inspiré de la risographie, caractérisé par des blocs de couleurs vives et plats, des contours tremblants dessinés à la main et une texture de grain uniforme et prononcée. Il mélange l'esthétique de la 'ligne claire' de la bande dessinée classique avec une sensibilité de fanzine indé contemporain et surréaliste, créant une ambiance détachée par le contraste entre couleurs ludiques et textures lo-fi.
description_en: A distinctive risograph-inspired illustration style characterized by vibrant, flat color blocks, shaky hand-drawn outlines, and a heavy, uniform grain texture. It blends the 'clear line' aesthetic of classic comics with a contemporary, surreal indie zine sensibility, often creating a cool, detached mood through the contrast of playful colors and gritty, lo-fi paper textures.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration inspiré de la risographie, caractérisé par des blocs de couleurs vives et plats, des contours tremblants dessinés à la main et une texture de grain uniforme et prononcée. The color palette is punchy and saturated, featuring a clash of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} that mimics the limited ink drum options of a Riso machine, creating a vibrant, poster-like impact. A defining characteristic of this style is the heavy, uniform stochastic noise and stipple grain overlay that covers the entire image, softening the digital sharpness and simulating the absorption of soy-based ink into rough, uncoated paper stock. This texture gives the image a sandy, matte finish and a nostalgic, lo-fi atmosphere. The composition is playful and surreal, often integrating floating, whimsical graphic elements or abstract organic shapes around the main figure to fill the negative space without creating a realistic background depth. The lighting is completely flat and ambient, rejecting all photorealistic physics in favor of a graphic, iconographic clarity. title: Luminous Gouache
description: Un style d'illustration contemporain qui mélange des aplats de couleurs audacieux avec un trait délicat et esquissé ainsi que des textures sèches et crayeuses. L'esthétique imite l'art éditorial numérique moderne avec une sensation artisanale faussement analogique, utilisant une géométrie simplifiée, des bords rugueux et une palette vibrante mais mate rappelant l'impression risographique.
description_en: A contemporary illustration style that blends flat, bold color blocking with delicate, sketchy linework and dry, chalky textures. The aesthetic mimics modern digital editorial art with a faux-analog, hand-crafted feel, utilizing simplified geometry, rough edges, and a vibrant yet matte palette reminiscent of risograph printing.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration contemporain qui mélange des aplats de couleurs audacieux avec un trait délicat et esquissé ainsi que des textures sèches et crayeuses. prompt: A high-end contemporary editorial illustration of {{subject}}, rendered in a distinctively naive and textured flat art style. The image must occupy the entire canvas full bleed, edge-to-edge, with no borders or margins. The visual execution mimics a blend of digital vector shapes and analog dry media. The {{subject}} is constructed from solid, flat blocks of color with distinctively rough, dry-brush edges, resembling the texture of chalk, crayon, or oil pastel rubbed onto coarse paper. These color shapes are overlaid with thin, jittery, fine-point black ink lines that act as loose contours and internal details; the linework is intentionally imperfect, possessing a nervous, sketchy quality akin to a graphite pencil or a rapid pen sketch, sometimes detaching slightly from the color fill to emphasize the hand-drawn aesthetic. The lighting is completely flat with no volumetric shading, gradients, or cast shadows, relying entirely on the contrast between the color blocks to define form. The color palette utilizes {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} in a manner reminiscent of risograph or screen printing—vibrant, matte, and slightly desaturated. The surface texture is palpable, featuring a consistent paper grain or noise overlay that unifies the composition. The overall atmosphere is {{mood}}, clean, and whimsical, typical of modern tech blog illustrations or high-brow magazine spots. title: Cozy Isometric
description: Une esthétique nostalgique de pixel art 16 bits rappelant les RPG classiques de l'ère SNES ou GBA, définie par des pixels carrés distincts et une palette de couleurs vibrante et limitée. Le style présente un rendu sans contours où les formes sont sculptées par des changements de valeurs nets et un ombrage en grappes, créant une atmosphère lo-fi chaleureuse avec un éclairage contrasté et tacheté.
description_en: A nostalgic 16-bit pixel art aesthetic reminiscent of classic SNES or GBA era RPGs, defined by distinct, chunky square pixels and a vibrant, limited color palette. The style features lineless rendering where forms are sculpted by sharp value changes and cluster shading, creating a cozy, lo-fi atmosphere with dappled, high-contrast lighting.
description_fr: Une esthétique nostalgique de pixel art 16 bits rappelant les RPG classiques de l'ère SNES ou GBA, définie par des pixels carrés distincts et une palette de couleurs vibrante et limitée. Le style présente un rendu sans contours où les formes sont sculptées par des changements de valeurs nets et un ombrage en grappes, créant une atmosphère lo-fi chaleureuse avec un éclairage contrasté et tacheté.
prompt: A high-fidelity 16-bit pixel art masterpiece depicting {{subject}}, rendered with the distinct aesthetic of a golden-age retro video game. The image utilizes a coarse, visible pixel grid where every detail is constructed from individual square color blocks, strictly avoiding any anti-aliasing, smoothing, or vector curves. The rendering style is lineless; do not use black outlines to define the {{subject}}. Instead, rely on sharp, geometric transitions between distinct color values to sculpt form and volume. The lighting is dramatic and atmospheric, featuring strong directional sunlight that casts hard-edged, blocky shadows across the {{subject}}, creating a vivid contrast between the illuminated areas in warm hues and the shaded recesses in deep, cool tones. The color palette is rich and saturated, utilizing {{primary_color}} as the dominant theme with accents of {{accent_color}} to highlight details, adhering to a limited color count typical of 16-bit graphics hardware. Textures are implied through 'cluster shading'—grouping pixels of similar colors to suggest material properties without noise or gradients. The scene must be fully immersive and occupy the entire canvas area.
